definition: The word "gelitten" refers to having experienced or endured something unpleasant or painful. It is commonly used to describe the state of having suffered or gone through a difficult situation.

examples.german: Sie hat unter der Trennung gelitten.
examples.english: She has suffered from the separation.

examples.german: Er hat viel gelitten, aber er ist immer noch stark.
examples.english: He has suffered a lot, but he is still strong.

examples.german: Die Pflanzen haben unter der Hitze gelitten.
examples.english: The plants have suffered from the heat.

examples.german: Die Bev√∂lkerung hat unter der Armut gelitten.
examples.english: The population has suffered from poverty.
